==Japanese==

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|れい}}
: 例 ([[ためし]], [[tameshi]])
: 例し (ためし, tameshi)

The most common reading is れい (rei).

# [[example]], [[instance]]

#*: as usual

#*: contrary to habit
